plot: Examines cinematic portrayals of Bram Stoker's Count Dracula including those of Bela Lugosi, John Carradine, and Christopher Lee.
title: 100 Years of Horror: Dracula and His Disciples
plot_es: Examines cinematic portrayals of Bram Stoker's Count Dracula including those of Bela Lugosi, John Carradine, and Christopher Lee.
original_name: 100 Years of Horror: Dracula and His Disciples
plot_en: Examines cinematic portrayals of Bram Stoker's Count Dracula including those of Bela Lugosi, John Carradine, and Christopher Lee.

cast.role: Herself - Actress, 'Dracula Has Risen from the Grave'
cast.name: Veronica Carlson
